docs.title: Legendary-winner overview
docs.text:
Technologies Used:

  • Python: Version 3.12
  • FastAPI: High-performance web framework for building APIs with Python.
  • SQLAlchemy: Python SQL toolkit and Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) library.
  • Pydantic: Data validation and settings management using Python type annotations.
  • MySQL: Relational database management system.
  • Alembic: Database migration tool

docs.title: Preparations
docs.text:
Generate secret key for your application.

openssl rand -hex 32

Create .env file

SECRET_KEY="my_secret_key_from_previous_step"
ALGORITHM="HS256"
ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRE_MINUTES=30
MYSQL_DATABASE="my_db"
MYSQL_USER="my_user"
MYSQL_PASSWORD="my_password"
MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD="my_password"

Docker version 25.0.3 Docker Compose version v2.24.6-desktop.1

docs.title: Create and start docker containers
docs.text:
docker-compose up --build

Once the container are up and running, it is required to upgrade mysql database to the latest revision.

alembic upgrade head

Then access http://localhost:8000/docs

docs.title: pre-commit
docs.text:
As a helper for linting we use pre-commit

pip install pre-commit
pre-commit install

docs.title: Tests
docs.text:
Enter docker container

docker-compose run -e -it legendary_winner /bin/bash

Execute tests locally

pytest tests/

At the moment there are no tests, just a placeholder for future tests implementation

docs.title: Local setup for rendering the docs
docs.text:
One can view the documentation in docs/ folder as follows

pip install --upgrade setuptools
pip install -r reqs/docs-requirements.txt
mkdocs serve

Then access http://127.0.0.1:8000/
